name: ref-testing
description: - [Testing via Cypress](#testing-via-cypress)   - [Refrence of commands used in tests](#refrence-of-commands-used-in-tests)

scripts.report:merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cy:report: npm run report:delete-results && npm run report:delete-mochawesome && npm run cy:run && npm run report:merge
